Posts.Content: goodgirl12797 wrote: Got a call from the doctor today to confirm my appointment for my Ductogram on Tuesday the 13th. I started asking questions, and now I am a little freaked out. She informed me that this test is necessary because sometimes the mammogram can miss DCIS and this will be the best way to find out. For starters I dont know what a ductogram is, or if it is painful, and secondly what is DCIS? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: DCIS? goodgirl12797 goodgirl12797
